name: Spanish Crosswords 4 Kids Lite
description:
"Spanish Crossword Puzzles for Kids Lite" will be interesting for children 3-10 years old and also for everybody who is learning Spanish as a foreign language.

Great tool to help build the vocabulary, spelling, reading and writing skills!
There is also a color-coded letter system that will help to figure out which letters go where in the puzzle.

The Lite version consists of 8 crosswords.
(The Full version consists of 48 crosswords with more than 300 Spanish words of different categories including animals, food, clothes, colors and many more).
